achievements.name: The Journey Begins
achievements.description: Choose your starter Pokemon from Professor Oak

achievements.name: Junior Researcher
achievements.description: Register 10 Pokemon in the Pokedex

achievements.name: Pokemon Collector
achievements.description: Register 50 Pokemon in the Pokedex

achievements.name: Pokedex Master
achievements.description: Register 100 Pokemon in the Pokedex

achievements.name: Kanto Completionist
achievements.description: Complete the Kanto Pokedex (150 Pokemon)

achievements.name: Boulder Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Brock and earn the Boulder Badge

achievements.name: Cascade Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Misty and earn the Cascade Badge

achievements.name: Thunder Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Lt. Surge and earn the Thunder Badge

achievements.name: Rainbow Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Erika and earn the Rainbow Badge

achievements.name: Soul Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Koga and earn the Soul Badge

achievements.name: Marsh Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Sabrina and earn the Marsh Badge

achievements.name: Volcano Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Blaine and earn the Volcano Badge

achievements.name: Earth Badge
achievements.description: Defeat Giovanni and earn the Earth Badge

achievements.name: Kanto Gym Champion
achievements.description: Defeat all 8 Gym Leaders

achievements.name: Ice Queen Slayer
achievements.description: Defeat Lorelei of the Elite Four

achievements.name: Fighting Master Slayer
achievements.description: Defeat Bruno of the Elite Four

achievements.name: Ghost Slayer
achievements.description: Defeat Agatha of the Elite Four

achievements.name: Dragon Slayer
achievements.description: Defeat Lance of the Elite Four

achievements.name: Elite Four Conqueror
achievements.description: Defeat all members of the Elite Four

achievements.name: Kanto Champion
achievements.description: Defeat your rival and become the Pokemon Champion

achievements.name: Genetic Master
achievements.description: Capture Mewtwo in Cerulean Cave

achievements.name: Flame Master
achievements.description: Capture Moltres on Mt. Ember

achievements.name: Thunder Master
achievements.description: Capture Zapdos in the Power Plant

achievements.name: Frost Master
achievements.description: Capture Articuno in Seafoam Islands

achievements.name: Legendary Bird Master
achievements.description: Capture Articuno, Zapdos, and Moltres

achievements.name: Kanto Legendary Master
achievements.description: Capture all legendary Pokemon in Kanto

achievements.name: Knot Island Explorer
achievements.description: Visit Knot Island (Sevii Islands)

achievements.name: Boon Island Explorer
achievements.description: Visit Boon Island (Sevii Islands)

achievements.name: Kin Island Explorer
achievements.description: Visit Kin Island (Sevii Islands)

achievements.name: Floe Island Explorer
achievements.description: Visit Floe Island (Sevii Islands)

achievements.name: Chrono Island Explorer
achievements.description: Visit Chrono Island (Sevii Islands)

achievements.name: Fortune Island Explorer
achievements.description: Visit Fortune Island (Sevii Islands)

achievements.name: Quest Island Explorer
achievements.description: Visit Quest Island (Sevii Islands)

achievements.name: Sevii Islands Conqueror
achievements.description: Visit all 7 Sevii Islands

achievements.name: Team Rocket Nemesis
achievements.description: Defeat Team Rocket at their Warehouse on Chrono Island

achievements.name: Bon Voyage
achievements.description: Board the S.S. Anne

achievements.name: Corporate Raider
achievements.description: Clear Silph Co. of Team Rocket

achievements.name: Rest in Peace
achievements.description: Reach the top of Pokemon Tower

achievements.name: Safari Hunter
achievements.description: Catch a Pokemon in the Safari Zone

achievements.name: Novice Angler
achievements.description: Catch a Pokemon with the Old Rod

achievements.name: Skilled Angler
achievements.description: Catch a Pokemon with the Good Rod

achievements.name: Master Angler
achievements.description: Catch a Pokemon with the Super Rod

achievements.name: Speed Demon
achievements.description: Obtain the Bicycle

achievements.name: Hidden Move Master
achievements.description: Collect all 7 HMs

achievements.name: Rematch Ready
achievements.description: Obtain the VS Seeker

achievements.name: Student of the Game
achievements.description: Watch the Teachy TV

achievements.name: Hundredaire
achievements.description: Amass 100,000 PokeDollars

achievements.name: Pokemon Millionaire
achievements.description: Amass 1,000,000 PokeDollars

achievements.name: Jackpot!
achievements.description: Win 100 coins at the Celadon Game Corner

achievements.name: Starter Collector
achievements.description: Obtain all three Kanto starters (Bulbasaur, Charmander, Squirtle)

achievements.name: Eevee Evolution Master
achievements.description: Obtain all Eevee evolutions (Vaporeon, Jolteon, Flareon)

achievements.name: Shiny Hunter
achievements.description: Capture your first Shiny Pokemon

achievements.name: Transformer
achievements.description: Capture Ditto

achievements.name: Waker of Giants
achievements.description: Wake up and capture both Snorlax

achievements.name: Silph Savior
achievements.description: Receive the Lapras from Silph Co.

achievements.name: Fighting Master
achievements.description: Obtain Hitmonlee or Hitmonchan from the Fighting Dojo

achievements.name: Paleontologist
achievements.description: Revive a fossil at the Cinnabar Lab

achievements.name: National Explorer
achievements.description: Obtain the National Pokedex
